entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is mentioned as someone who was at Hogwarts and became something unexpected. He is described as a boy at Hogwarts and his future actions are discussed.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Although not explicitly stated, it can be inferred that Harry Potter is Sirius Black's best friend from Hogwarts.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Not mentioned by name but referred to as 'you' in the conversation between Fudge and Rosmerta. It can be inferred that Dumbledore is someone who knows about Sirius Black's past.

entities.name: ruthless fudge
entities.description: Fudge is described as gruff and seems to know more about Sirius Black than he lets on.

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Rosmerta is curious about Sirius Black's past and remembers him from Hogwarts.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall seems to know more about Sirius Black than she lets on and asks Rosmerta if she remembers who his best friend was.

relationships.description: It can be inferred that Sirius Black and Harry Potter were best friends at Hogwarts.
Fudge seems to know more about Sirius Black's past than he lets on, suggesting a relationship with Dumbledore who is likely aware of the information.
